snippet.title: SPINE - Early Gameplay Teaser - Gun Fu in the Market
snippet.description:
Is your Gun Fu strong enough? Wishlist us at https://spine.game/ 

SPINE is a single-player story rich action game for PC/PS5/Xbox Series focused on intense close-quarters gun fights with aesthetics of Gun Fu movies. Explore the cinematic vision of a near-future with a rebellious street artist Redline and her sentient combat implant, Spine, as they challenge an autocratic AI regime in search of Redline’s captured brother. Participate in highly cinematic gunfights staged by actual movie specialists, relive your favorite epic action scenes, and create your own.

Follow SPINE on social networks:

https://discord.gg/playspine
https://twitter.com/playspine
https://www.tiktok.com/@playspine
https://www.instagram.com/playspine
https://www.facebook.com/playspine

#playSPINE #GunFu
